good: Has experience and wants a repeatable process
Willing to log and review decisions
bad: Looking for signals or copy trading
Profit is the only goal, no records or reviews

metrics.title: How we measure progress (capability, not profit)
metrics.lead: Sustainability comes from behavior quality. We track these process metrics.
metrics.note: Metrics are for process improvement and do not represent performance results.

process.title: Onboarding process
prepItems: Recent 20-30 trades (screenshots, Excel, or platform export)
Your current entry/stop/size rules (even if rough)
Your top 2-3 issues (chasing, holding losers, over-sizing)

items.a: We provide framework and validation methods so you can build your own rules.

items.q: Do you offer signals or copy trading?
items.a: No. We focus on training: planning, execution, review, and risk.

items.q: How soon can I see changes?
items.a: Early changes show up in process metrics: higher execution rate, fewer violations, better review quality.

items.q: Is this suitable for short-term or day trading?
items.a: Yes. The focus is risk control and execution, not a specific timeframe.
Major pairs are preferred due to liquidity and stable spreads.

final.title: Ready to make trading repeatable?
final.lead: After the form, we review your records and issues, then schedule a diagnosis with a 2-4 week training proposal.
